content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: TestIAMPermissions path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/identity/v1/accounts/{account_id}/iam/test content: params
name accountid
desc an account id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum test account policies
reqbody
identitytestiampermissionsrequest
type obj
permissions
type str
desc the set of permissions to test
required true
responses
200
identitytestiampermissionsresponse
type obj
props
accountid
type str
desc the id of the stackpath account the permissions were tested on
permissions
type str
desc the set of permissions that the calling user does have on the account
desc a response from a request to test permissions on a stackpath account
title: 0_Account Policies_TestIAMPermissions_1.json
